data.title: Tasty
data.text: I was in the area and while walking i notice this Roti Shop and walked pass as am on a diet it but my stomach was not having it so i went in and brought a Boneless  Chicken  Roti .and a fry bake that i was going to use for my breakfast the next day I took it to go as i needed to get on the Metro North it was delicious and the server friendly .My only regret about my meal was that i wish i could have sat down and eat it right away but its OK me and that roti shop will meet again.
